text: aur (ai rasool) vah vaakeya bhee yaad karo jab ibaraaheem ne (khuda se) darakhvaast kee ki ai mere paravaradigaar too mujhe bhee to dikha de ki too murdon ko kyonkar zinda karata hai khuda ne faramaaya kya tumhen (isaka) yaqeen nahin ibaraaheem ne arz kee (kyon nahin) yaqeen to hai magar onkh se dekhana isalie chaahata hoon ki mere dil ko poora itminaan ho jae faramaaya (agar ye chaahate ho) to chaar parinde lo aur unako apane paas maigava lo aur tukade tukade kar daalo phir har pahaad par unaka ek ek tukada rakh do usake baad unako bulao (phir dekho to kyon kar vah sab ke sab tumhaare paas daude hue aate hain aur samajh rakho ki khuda beshak gaalib aur hikamat vaala hai)
